text:
My application does not always add an NDC to every entry, so some of the NDC
values are null. When you double-click on the NDC column in chainsaw to sort, it
will not sort properly if some of the values are null.
creator: mdwheaton@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 16700
A demonstration of NDC column that does not sort correctly.

This is a file that demonstrates the quirky NDC sorting behavior if some
elements are null.
creator: mdwheaton@gmail.com

text:
committed a change to fix this - not sure if it will make it into the next alpha
build

Thanks
